div.p: The codes that describe whether or not the patient has arrived at the specified location for the encounter.
Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from and copyrighted by Intermountain Healthcare HDD
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/hspc-arrivalStatus defines the following codes:

tr.td: The patient is present at the service delivery location.
The patient is currently travelling to the service delivery location.

description.value: The codes that describe whether or not the patient has arrived at the specified location for the encounter.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from and copyrighted by Intermountain Healthcare HDD

definition.value: The patient is present at the service delivery location.
The patient is currently travelling to the service delivery location.
